original_text: The gods of Hamath and Arpad could not help their people. The gods of Sepharvaim, Hena and Ivvah could not help their people either. No god was able to rescue Samaria from my power.
korean_text: 하맛과 아르밧의 신들이 어디 있으며 스발와임과 헤나와 아와의 신들이 어디 있느냐 그들이 사마리아를 내 손에서 건졌느냐

sentences.original_text: The gods of Hamath and Arpad
The gods of Sepharvaim, Hena and Ivvah
could not help their people either
to rescue Samaria from my power
